languages.text: "Воистину! Император защищает!" {n}Звенящий и волевой голос Комиссара подхватывает ваш клич, а за ним и остальные люди.{/n}
"Indeed! The Emperor protects!" {n}The Commissar's imperious, booming voice repeats your call, and the rest follow suit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Воистину! Император защищает!" {n}Звенящий и волевой голос Комиссара подхватывает ваш клич, а за ним и остальные люди.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Indeed! The Emperor protects!" {n}The Commissar's booming and powerful voice repeats your call, and the rest follow suit.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “确实如此！愿帝皇庇佑祂的子民！”{n}政委以洪亮而威严的声音重复着你的祈祷，剩下的人也都有样学样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed! The Emperor protects!" {n}The Commissar's imperious, booming voice repeats your call, and the rest follow suit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “确实如此！愿帝皇庇佑祂的子民！”{n}政委以洪亮而威严的声音重复着你的祈祷，剩下的人也都有样学样。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「皇帝に栄光あれ！」{n}コミッサーは威圧的な大声でオウム返しをすると、他の者も同様に復唱する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed! The Emperor protects!" {n}The Commissar's imperious, booming voice repeats your call, and the rest follow suit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝に栄光あれ！」{n}コミッサーは威圧的な大声でオウム返しをすると、他の者も同様に復唱する。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «¡En efecto! ¡El Emperador protege!». {n}La voz imperiosa y estruendosa del Comisario repite tu alabanza, y los demás le siguen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed! The Emperor protects!" {n}The Commissar's imperious, booming voice repeats your call, and the rest follow suit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡En efecto! ¡El Emperador protege!». {n}La voz imperiosa y estruendosa del Comisario repite tu alabanza, y los demás le siguen.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "Indeed! The Emperor protects!" {n}The Commissar's imperious, booming voice repeats your call, and the rest follow suit.{/n}

languages.text: « Tout à fait ! L'Empereur protège ! » {n}Le commissaire répète vos paroles d'une voix impérieuse et les autres ne tardent pas à faire de même.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed! The Emperor protects!" {n}The Commissar's imperious, booming voice repeats your call, and the rest follow suit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait ! L'Empereur protège ! » {n}Le commissaire répète vos paroles d'une voix impérieuse et les autres ne tardent pas à faire de même.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "In der Tat! Der Imperator schützt uns!" {n}Die gebieterische, tragende Stimme des Kommissars wiederholt deinen Gruß, und die übrigen tun es ihm nach.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed! The Emperor protects!" {n}The Commissar's imperious, booming voice repeats your call, and the rest follow suit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat! Der Imperator schützt uns!" {n}Die gebieterische, tragende Stimme des Kommissars wiederholt deinen Gruß, und die übrigen tun es ihm nach.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Evet! İmparator korur!" {n}Komiser; emir yağdıran, gürleyen sesiyle senin söylediklerini tekrar ediyor. Sonrasında diğerleri de ona ayak uyduruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed! The Emperor protects!" {n}The Commissar's imperious, booming voice repeats your call, and the rest follow suit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Evet! İmparator korur!" {n}Komiser, emreden ve gürleyen sesiyle senin söylediklerini tekrar ediyor ve geri kalanlar da ona ayak uyduruyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
